activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12222
activity.text:
Hi! üëã

I noticed this issue has been marked as stale, and there hasn't been any recent activity. I'd like to work on this and submit a fix.

From what I see, the issue seems to stem from event propagation when using select or selectContent inside EntitySelectionSheet. I plan to prevent the sheet from closing by stopping event propagation (e.stopPropagation()) and, if needed, refining the outside click handler to ignore interactions within dropdowns.

Please let me know if it's okay for me to take this on!

Thanks!

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12448
activity.text:
Hi team üëã,

I'd like to take up this issue as part of the GDC AI Internship.

Solution Outline:

Convert the linkId input to a dropdown listing all non-structured/display question IDs + their text.

Based on the selected linkId, dynamically render the answer input:

Use dropdown for boolean (true/false) and choice types.

Keep text input for other types.

Ensure current functionality remains intact.

Timeline:

PR within 3‚Äì4 days after assignment.

Looking forward to contributing! Please assign this to me üôå

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12452
activity.text:
Hi team üëã,

I'd like to work on this issue as part of the GDC AI Internship.

My proposed solution is:

Frontend Validation (if applicable):

Ensure that the gender input dropdown/radio only allows valid values (0, 1, 2).

Add form validation to prevent submission of invalid gender values.

Backend Validation:

Add a server-side check to validate that the gender value must be one of the allowed values.

If the application uses a database schema or ORM, I will enforce validation using constraints (e.g., ENUM, CHECK) at the model or schema level.

Data Audit:

Write a script or migration to identify and fix existing invalid values in the database (e.g., change all gender = 3 to 0 or another appropriate default).

Please assign me this issue.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12377

I have reviewed the feature requirements and believe I can implement this with proper validation to ensure seamless reassignment while maintaining data integrity.
Based on initial assessment, I estimate about 2 to 4 days to deliver a robust solution including testing.
Looking forward to contributing!
